comments.body: So in the end I believe that this change is hiding a real regression: https://root.cern/doc/master/structROOT_1_1RDF_1_1TH1DModel.html should not be one of the completion options as it is not on global scope.

That is correct but see the discussion going from https://github.com/root-project/root/pull/5847/files#r468815354 onward. Essentially we currently regress when we have:
`using namespace ROOT::RDF` and type TH1<tab> and we do not complete the TH1DModel...

> Essentially we currently regress when we have:
using namespace ROOT::RDF and type TH1 and we do not complete the TH1DModel

That's not a regression, it's a missing feature that would be great to have implemented!
